major: Nutrition & Health Sciences: Nutrition, Exercise & Health Science Option

Nutrition, Exercise & Health Science.1: Understand and apply physiological and mechanical concepts to exercise.
Nutrition, Exercise & Health Science.2: Understand and apply nutrient function and food concepts to healthy living.
Nutrition, Exercise & Health Science.3: Apply behavior modification theories and models to promote healthy living.
Nutrition, Exercise & Health Science.4: Develop competent knowledge and skills for health professional schools.
